prodNameC: 邦迪斯 大鼠腎、胃免疫螢光染色套組/玻片
prodNameE: The Binding Site RAT KIDNEY, STOMACH IFA KIT/SLIDES
ingredientsDesc:
1. Rat kidney, stomach sections on 5- or 10-well slides.
KITS ONLY :
2. ANA homogeneous control serum, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted, read for use.
3. Negative control serum, universally negative for all autoantibodies, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted, ready for use.
4. Affinity purified sheep anti-human lgG (H+L) fluorescein isothiocyanate, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted, ready for use.
5. Mitochondrial positive control serum, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted ready for use.
6. Smooth muscle positive control serum, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted ready for use.
7. 1% Evans Blue, as an optional counterstain.
8. Phosphate buffered saline (PBS), provided as a 20-fold concentrate in liquid form.
9. Blotters, to blot the slides after washing.
10.Mounting medium, containing an anti-fading agent (DABCO 1, 4 diazabicylo [2.2.2] octane.
11.Coverslips.
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 本分析套組用於體外篩檢與滴定人類血清中抗核抗體 (anti-nuclear antibodies, ANA)、抗粒腺體抗體 (anti-mitochondria antibodies, AMA)、抗平滑肌抗體 (anti-smooth muscle antibodies, ASMA) 與抗胃壁細胞抗體 (anti-gastric parietal cell antibodies, AGPCA) 自體抗體。
mdFormat: FK014.1: 50T kit, FK014.2: 250T kit, FS014.1: 10x5-well slides, FS014.2: 25x10-well slides
